content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipėda district court the text does not provide specific details about the parties or the nature of the case it discusses the costs involved in the legal proceedings with the defendant being responsible for paying €41250 for stamp duty and professional fees as well as an additional €43 for stamp duty the applicant is responsible for paying €7756 for stamp duty and professional fees as well as an additional €219 for stamp duty the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the defendant will receive €990613 in their personal bank account while the applicant will receive €130 in their personal bank account the applicant is also required to pay the defendant €190004 as compensation for the defendants increased share of assets and personal debts in return the defendant must pay the applicant €53494 as compensation for the applicants share of the property the legal text discusses two articles in the civil code related to matrimonial property the applicant is seeking the dissolution of their marriage due to the defendants fault claiming alcohol abuse and infidelity as reasons the defendant denies these claims and argues that the applicants behavior caused the marriage to break down the court examines the evidence and makes decisions regarding the division of property and compensation the court also determines which party is responsible for paying the costs of the proceedings the court has ordered the dissolution of the marriage between rrj and aj with aj receiving €990613 and rrj receiving €130 in their personal bank accounts aj is also awarded €190004 in compensation from rrjs increased share of assets and personal debts while rrj is awarded €53494 in compensation for their share of the property both parties are required to pay stamp duty fees to the state a copy of the decision will be sent to the civil registry office for the registration of the divorce
